item.title: Historic Ybor City Food Walking Tour
item.description: This historic Ybor City food tour gives you a perfect introduction to the Tampa area by taking you to eateries to sample up to six food and drink tastings. A guide leads the way on foot telling you all about Ybor city history as you try food to see which restaurants you might want to go back to later during your stay in the city.

image.alt: Historic Ybor City Food Walking Tour

item.title: Guided Tampa Sightseeing Tour in a Deluxe Street Legal Golf Cart
item.description: Tampa is a city of many cultures, communities, and cuisines. Cruise around in a street-legal golf cart and discover local secrets, history, and culture from a local guide. Ride around multiple parts of the city where you’ll pass by the city's most expensive neighborhoods, historic Ybor City, restaurants, shops, and much more. All you have to do is sit back and relax as you enjoy the best of Tampa.

image.alt: Guided Tampa Sightseeing Tour in a Deluxe Street Legal Golf Cart

item.title: Zip Line Adventure over Tampa Bay
item.description: Located just outside of Tampa on the pristine Old Tampa Bay, Mobbly Bayou Wilderness Preserve offers the ideal getaway from the city. Explore the reserve with a zipline adventure on this tour, which includes 5 zipline cables, a 200-foot (60 meter) high suspension bridge, high ropes course, and more.

image.alt: Zip Line Adventure over Tampa Bay

item.title: Shared Ybor City Historic Walking Tour
item.description: As one of only three Historic Landmark Districts in Florida, Ybor City is a can’t-miss neighborhood when visiting Tampa. Often disputed, this area is known as the origin of the classic Cuban sandwich. This small group shared tour will delve into the history of the sandwich, the cigars, and the vibrant Cuban culture which is still thriving in the community today.

image.alt: Shared Ybor City Historic Walking Tour

item.title: 2 Hour Guided Segway Tour
item.description: Discover the city of Tampa with ease as you explore on a Segway during this guided tour. Join a small group and glide through the streets of the downtown area. See the Amalie Arena, ride on the Tampa Riverwalk, follow the Hillsborough River to Curtis Hixon Park, and learn about the city from your tour guide.

image.alt: 2 Hour Guided Segway Tour

item.title: Tiki Boat - Downtown Tampa - The Only Authentic Floating Tiki Bar
item.description: Tampa is known for its party scene, but the city bars can be overcrowded and even uncomfortable at times. Take your private party to the water with this 90 minute - Tiki Boat Cruise in Tampa – BYOB. You’ll bring your own snacks and drinks and get to sip as you cruise down Hillsborough River on a unique, floating tiki bar. Pass skyscrapers and downtown Tampa as you party with your own group.

image.alt: Tiki Boat - Downtown Tampa - The Only Authentic Floating Tiki Bar

item.title: Ybor City Food Tour On Sundays
item.description:
Experience the delights of Ybor City Food Tour where we stop at 4-5 food tastings to offer you a chance to Savor The Taste Of Ybor through food and a staple drink: Cafe Con Leche. This fun-filled day consists of an easy 3-hour, walking tour.
Beyond the diverse eats and that you will indulge in, you will be fascinated by the historical stories of this age old city that was established since 1855. So much rich culture and history that both your taste pallets and your mental senses will both be delighted and enlightened!

image.alt: Ybor City Food Tour On Sundays

item.title: Haunted Tampa Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour - Ybor City
item.description: Mix up some haunted history with night-out pub visits during this Haunted Tampa Ghost and Pub Walking Tour - Ybor City. This Tampa ghost and pub tour stops at four pubs where you’ll hear some tales of those pub’s spooky past. A guide knows the area well and goes into detail about what makes each older pub so historic.

image.alt: Haunted Tampa Booze and Boos Ghost Walking Tour - Ybor City

item.title: Guided Tampa Sightseeing Tour in New Street Legal Golf Cart
item.description: See all of Tampa's iconic neighborhoods and learn about the city's history in one of the most fun ways around - by a street legal golf cart. You will Tour each Tampa neighborhood, visit the university's campus and admire the beautiful Riverwalk, and take plenty of stops for photos at landmarks along the way. Cover plenty of ground in your golf cart while breathing in the warm Florida air. This tour is owned and operated by a University of Tampa graduate.

image.alt: Guided Tampa Sightseeing Tour in New Street Legal Golf Cart

item.title: Tampa Terrors Ghost Tour By US Ghost Adventures
item.description: Unless you’re a history buff, history tours can sometimes feel a bit dry and stuffy. Instead, opt for this Walking Ghost Tour in Tampa that adds a mysterious touch to the city’s past, making for a scary-good time. You’ll see places such as the Tampa Theatre, Old City Hall, and other landmarks and streets where the true stories are sure to give you chills.

image.alt: Tampa Terrors Ghost Tour By US Ghost Adventures

item.title: The Official Downtown Tampa Ghost Tour
item.description: A walking tour of the oldest and most haunted buildings in Downtown Tampa, FL. Stories of murder and tragedy. Organized Crime history. Sites on the National Haunted Registry.

image.alt: The Official Downtown Tampa Ghost Tour

item.title: Tampa Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate
item.description: Discover what skydiving feels like without the throw-yourself-out-of-a-plane part during an indoor experience in Florida. At iFLY Tampa, you'll "fly" inside a vertical wind tunnel, which mimics the free-fall of skydiving. Training is provided, and no experience is required.

image.alt: Tampa Indoor Skydiving Experience with 2 Flights & Personalized Certificate

item.title: Tampa Bay CityPASS®
item.description: Experience Tampa’s must-see tourist attractions — and enjoy considerable savings — on this exciting Tampa Bay CityPASS. Visit Busch Gardens® Tampa Bay, the Florida Aquarium, and ZooTampa at Lowry Park. Then choose admission to 2 more attractions of your choice: Clearwater Marine Aquarium, The Tropics Boat Tours Dolphin or Sunset Cruise, Museum of Science and Industry (MOSI), or Glazer Children's Museum. This Tampa Bay CityPASS is valid for nine consecutive days from the first date of use. Transportation to and from attractions is not included.

image.alt: Tampa Bay CityPASS®

item.title: The Florida Aquarium in Tampa General Admission
item.description: Explore and learn about more than 15,000 sea creatures at the Florida Aquarium in downtown Tampa. Discover reef fishes, tortoises, and more from Florida’s seas as well as wetland wildlife including alligators and river otters. Investigate the Indian Ocean in the 'Journey to Madagascar' exhibit, and learn about the aquarium's conservation efforts.

image.alt: The Florida Aquarium in Tampa General Admission

item.title: 4 hour Fishing Charter with a Tampa Native
item.description:
Captain Jason Dozier is a Florida native who grew up fishing and learning to navigate Florida’s back country and inter-coastal waterways. He has a U.S. Coast Guard 50 ton masters captain license which allows him to pursue his passion of sharing his love, respect, and knowledge of Florida’s pristine coasts.To Capt. Jason, putting his clients on fish is not just a job its a passion; it’s an addiction and it’s a rush. He will work diligently to make sure that you get to enjoy the beautiful waters he gets to fish on everyday just as much as he does.
We will be fishing in and visiting some of Tampa's most beautiful islands, creeks, and sandbars inside of Tampa Bay. Tampa Bay is the largest open-water estuary in Florida, encompassing nearly 400 square miles and bordering three counties -- Hillsborough, Manatee and Pinellas. The bay's sprawling watershed covers a land area nearly five times as large, at 2,200 square miles.

image.alt: 4 hour Fishing Charter with a Tampa Native

item.title: Tampa History Cruise
item.description: Explore one of Florida's most picturesque harbors on this Tampa history cruise that transports travelers back in time across stunning blue waters. See the real-life pirate ship known as Gabriella up close and take in views of million-dollar homes, popular museums, and the famous 'Plant Hotel' as you listen to expert commentary about the city's rich past.

image.alt: Tampa History Cruise

item.title: ZooTampa at Lowry Park Admission Ticket
item.description: Visit ZooTampa at Lowry Park for a family-friendly wildlife experience that includes native Florida animals as well as species from around the world. Check out the variety of habitats that are home to wildlife from Asia, Africa, Australia and more, where you can see apes, birds, tortoises, panthers, manatees, koalas… the list goes on. Plus, learn about endangered species and the zoo’s efforts in animal conservation.

image.alt: ZooTampa at Lowry Park Admission Ticket

item.title: Downtown Tampa Historic Walking Tour
item.description: See the historic site of Fort Brooke, where Presidents Andrew Jackson and Zachary Taylor would fight the Seminoles in their military years. The beautiful “Plant Hall” where Henry B. Plant competed dollar for dollar with Henry Flagler for elegance. As well as the Hotel Floridan Palace, The Tampa Theatre, and many more. Come along a 90-minute stroll through the shade and learn why Tampa is one of the most unique cities in America.

image.alt: Downtown Tampa Historic Walking Tour

item.title: Private Tampa City Tour by Custom Golf Cart
item.description: Drive through Tampa, Florida in a golf cart, and listen to tales about the city’s storied past and vibrant present. Enjoy a private tour of the city, and see it all in a way that many locals never will as you travel from Armature Works to Curtis Hixon Waterfront Park to the Channel District (and more) in a comfortable custom golf cart.

image.alt: Private Tampa City Tour by Custom Golf Cart

item.title: 1.5-hour Dolphin Sightseeing Cruise from Tampa
item.description: See dolphins and other marine wildlife on a guided, 90-minute cruise along the bustling waters of Tampa Bay. Choose from a morning or afternoon departure time, then discover Tampa Bay’s fascinating ecosystem. Look for an abundance of wildlife that lives there — bottlenose dolphins, fish, birds, manatees, sea turtles and more — and learn how they thrive in one of the nation’s most diverse seaports, Port Tampa Bay.

image.alt: 1.5-hour Dolphin Sightseeing Cruise from Tampa

item.title: Ghost Investigation Tour Interactive Paranormal Experience 18Plus
item.description: For those over 18 years old who are after a paranormal experience, then this ghost investigation tour in Tampa is for you. This is an interactive tour, so be ready to be an active ghost hunter. Besides the haunted hunt, you also explore Tampa at the same time. Visit Ybor City, Jose Marti Park, Cigar City Cider and Mead, and more.

image.alt: Ghost Investigation Tour Interactive Paranormal Experience 18Plus

item.title: Tampa Celebrity Homes Boat Tour
item.description: Many celebrity homes in Tampa can only be reached by boat. This Tampa Celebrity Homes Boat Tour takes you out on Tampa Bay to the canals near Davis Islands without having to rent a boat. Catch sight of famous folks’ homes, including baseball players, football players, and actors and actresses. Most tours also run into dolphins in the water as they cruise.

image.alt: Tampa Celebrity Homes Boat Tour

item.title: Escape to Paradise: Private Island Boat Adventure in Tampa Bay
item.description: Welcome aboard Staying Afloat Party Boat Tampa for an island hopping extravaganza you'll never forget! Our private boat adventure in Tampa Bay is all about fun, sun, and making unforgettable memories. Cruise through the sparkling waters, soak up the Florida sun, and explore the hidden gems of the Bay's islands. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or just looking for a day of tropical escape, our boat ride offers the perfect blend of relaxation and excitement. Join us for a day of island bliss, with music and great company. Each boat holds up to 12 passengers and stop at beaches, bars, and restaurants along your tour; feel free to customize it however you like. Guests are welcome to BYOB drinks+food. Your private boat odyssey awaits, come and make a splash with us! THIS IS NOT THE FULL PRICE: Due to US Coast Guard bareboat laws, you are required to select and pay the Captain directly the day of. Captains rates are $30/hr and can be paid via zelle, venmo, or cash.

image.alt: Escape to Paradise: Private Island Boat Adventure in Tampa Bay

item.title: Tampa Bar Crawl on a 2023 Street Legal Golf Cart
item.description: Explore the Tampa, Florida bar scene from the comfort of a street-legal golf cart and a driver to help you get around with ease. From Downtown Tampa to the hip Channel District to Tampa Heights, and more, let your tour leader show you some of the best spots in the city. If you’d like to lean into a specific vibe, just let your guide know.

image.alt: Tampa Bar Crawl on a 2023 Street Legal Golf Cart
